name: Pokémon Chrome
overview: Story: This game’s story-line will be quite unique, not your average staple Pokemon game. You start off in the region of Kalou, a mountainous island filled region. You live on the peak of a Mt.Lagna, an isolated spot with only two houses, your’s and a failed Pokemon Professor who lives in an abandoned disapproved Pokemon Gym. Despite it being your birthday, your overprotective mother forbids you from owning a Pokemon. That day you run an errand for the Pokemon Professor, traveling to a nearby city down the mountain. You borrow a Pokemon for your safety, only your’s to keep until you return home. However, a series of events may befall you that day that will prevent you from returning home and more importantly, your Pokemon. You are thrust out into an adventure filled with all sorts of wonder and challenges, making new friends along the way...your brand new adventure starts now. Features: - It’s a brand new game, you won’t even recognize Gold. - Two completely new regions - Completely revamped graphics, some custom and others borrowed from 3rd Generation games - All new scripts, everything is completely new and custom - New TM/HM/Attacks, several ported from newer generation games - Pokemon borrowed from future generations - Running Shoes added in - Fresh new story-line - No more UPPERCASE words. Everything in lowercase - PLENTY more features you'll see from just playing it
